scripts.clean: rm -rf build/release-emscripten-wasm32; rm -rf build/debug-emscripten-wasm32; yarn copy-pak
scripts.copy-pak: mkdir -p build/release-emscripten-wasm32/baseq3/; mkdir -p build/debug-emscripten-wasm32/baseq3/; cp ../q3-server/baseq3/* build/release-emscripten-wasm32/baseq3/; cp ../q3-server/baseq3/* build/debug-emscripten-wasm32/baseq3/; cp ../q3-server/baseq3/* build/release-darwin-arm64/baseq3/
scripts.copy-pak:point-release: mkdir -p build/release-emscripten-wasm32/baseq3/; mkdir -p build/debug-emscripten-wasm32/baseq3/; cp ../paks/Point-Release-1.32-PAK/* build/release-emscripten-wasm32/baseq3/; cp ../paks/Point-Release-1.32-PAK/* build/debug-emscripten-wasm32/baseq3/
scripts.context: ./scripts/context.sh -o contexts/ioq3.txt --strip-comments -r -e h -e c code/client/cl_main.c code/client/client.h code/qcommon/qcommon.h code/qcommon/net_chan.c code/qcommon/net_ip.c code/qcommon/net_ws.c
